description: Open redirect vulnerability in IBM Emptoris Sourcing 10.0.0.x before 10.0.0.1_iFix3, 10.0.1.x before 10.0.1.3_iFix3, 10.0.2.x before 10.0.2.8_iFix1, 10.0.4.0 before 10.0.4.0_iFix8, and 10.1.0.0 before 10.1.0.0_iFix3 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors. IBM X-Force ID: 111692.
